source.query: select distinct pt.firstname,pt.lastname,to_char(pt.dob,'MM-DD-YYYY') as dob,to_char(ap.appointmentdate,'MM-DD-YYYY') as date,ap.begintime as begin_time,pt.patientid as patient_id,ap.encounterid as encounter_id,pt.membersubscriberid as member_subscriber_id,pt.insurancetype as insurance_type,pt.deleteindicator as delete_indicator,pt.providerclinicianname as provider_clinician_name,pt.resource as resource,pt.addressline1 as address_line_1,pt.city as city,pt.state as state,pt.zip as zip,pt.sex as gender,pt.race as race,pt.ethnicity as ethnicity,pt.location as location,pt.homephone as home_phone,pt.mobilephone as mobile_phone,pt.workphone as work_phone from upperline.raw_inbound_affiliatedata.stg_bisbee_appointmentdata pt join upperline.raw_inbound_affiliatedata.stg_bisbee_appointmentdata ap on pt.encounterid = ap.encounterid
